SOMA.finance's

Solutions

/ 1
First Mover
in Compliance
Through Tritaurian Capital, SOMA.finance currently has the only SEC & FINRA approved license to offer tokenized securities on the blockchain*
/ 2
Multi-Asset
Platform
SOMA.finance will initially launch with 20-30 tokenized equities, ETFs, crypto assets, and STOs with more products to be added
/ 3
‍
P2P AMM
Transactions
Trade across all asset classes in a P2P and decentralized fashion, without having a centralized orderbook or there being room for market manipulation
/ 4
‍
Semi-Permissionless
Access to DeFi
Following the proper KYC/AML guidelines, institutions and retail alike will be able to access yield farming and liquidity provider incentives

Features

$SOMA Token

Utility

$SOMA will be US compliant under Reg D, Reg A+, and Reg S offerings.

The $SOMA token, as a compliant security, will allow for:

  • Yield Farming Opportunities
  • Dividends and Airdrops
  • Governance & Token Holder Rights
  • Buybacks & Burns
  • Staking

Introducing

SOMASTARTER

Fully compliant issuance platform and launchpad for the issuance of tokenised securities (STOs) following global KYC and AML requirements under US Reg CF/D/A+/S filings

View UI

SOMA.finance

Roadmap

2nd half of 2021
  • MANTRA DAO & Tritaurian Capital create joint venture partnership to launch SOMA.finance
  • Complete seed round fund raising
  • Launch v1 platform with tokenized equities, cryptos, ETFs & fiat on/off ramps
1st half of 2022
  • Complete liquidity round fund raising
  • Launch Reg CF for US retail investors
  • Integrate DeFi yield farming funcationalities
  • Broaden MTL coverage
  • Issue first regulated security  token on SOMA platform
2nd half of 2022
  • Expand product offering with commodities, precious metals, options & futures
  • Facilitate margin loans & lending
  • Integrate additional blockchain networks including Polygon, Solana & MANTRA DAO Polkadot parachain
  • Acquire New York BitLicense

You can view the TTC BrokerCheck record here and reach their website here.
